item.title: Water Leak, 16th December
item.description:
Severn Trent suggested this is the responsibility of the council, not them. There has been no rain yet this section has water flowing down the slope making the road surface even more damaged. Going on for over a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Mill Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Tree knocked over, 16th December
item.description:
A tree has been knocked over, it looks like it might be able to be saved if its put back carefully. Its outside number 4 cambridge avenue. Noticed this morning but will need quick actions if its to be saved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Cambridge Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
